author: Graham Lawton
title: How to fight infection by turning back your immune system's clock
description: Your immune system ages too, weakening as you get older and making you more susceptible to infections. Fortunately, we are discovering plenty of things you can do to turn back the clock and stay healthy
content:
By Graham Lawton
Fransesco Bongiorni
WASH your hands religiously for 20 seconds, sneeze into your elbow, avoid touching your face, stay 1 metre away from all other people and, as a last resort, self-quarantine for a week with only your emergency rations for… [+1332 chars]
